resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102866</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102866</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205756</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Song of America</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lied von Amerika</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chanson de l'Amérique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Canção de América</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Canzone dell'America</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τραγούδι της Αμερικής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Canción de América</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">commemorates the history of song composition in America. Learn about 10 composers, including Charles Ives (In Flander's Fields), Stephen Foster (Oh! Susanna), and Francis Hopkinson -- the only American-born composer known to have written songs before 1800. Hear and see the music for nearly 20 songs, including Shenandoah and Danny Deever.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gedenkt die Geschichte des Liedaufbaus in Amerika.
Erlernen Sie ungefähr 10 Komponisten, einschließlich Charles 
Ives (in Flanders Fängt) auf, Pflege Stephen (OH-! 
Susanna) und Francis Hopkinson -- der einzige 
Amerikanisch-getragene Komponist bekannt, um schriftliche Liede vor 
1800 zu haben. Hören Sie und sehen Sie die Musik für fast 20 
Liede, einschließlich Shenandoah und Danny Deever.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">commémore l'histoire de composition de chanson en
Amérique. Apprenez environ 10 compositeurs, y compris Charles 
Ives (dans les domaines de Flander), Stephen adoptif (l'OH ! 
Susanna), et Francis Hopkinson -- le seul compositeur 
Américain-soutenu connu pour avoir des chansons écrites avant 1800. 
Entendez et voyez la musique pour presque 20 chansons, y compris
Shenandoah et Danny Deever.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">comemora o history da composição da canção em 
América. Aprenda aproximadamente 10 compositores, including 
Charles Ives (em campos de Flander), Stephen foster (Oh! 
Susanna), e Francis Hopkinson -- único compositor 
Americano-carregado conhecido para ter canções escritas antes de 
1800. Ouça e veja a música para quase 20 canções, including 
Shenandoah e Danny Deever.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">commemora la storia della composizione di canzone 
in America. Impari circa 10 compositori, compreso Charles Ives 
(nei campi del Flander), Stephen adottivo (l'OH! Susanna) e 
Francis Hopkinson -- l'unico compositore Americano-sopportato 
conosciuto per avere canzoni scritte prima di 1800. Senta e veda
la musica per quasi 20 canzoni, compreso Shenandoah e Danny Deever.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τιμά την μνήμη της ιστορίας της σύνθεσης τραγουδιού 
στην Αμερική. Μάθετε περίπου 10 συνθέτες, 
συμπεριλαμβανομένου Charles Ives (στα πεδία Flander), 
stephen Foster (OH! Του Susanna), και Francis 
Hopkinson -- ο μόνος αμερικανικός-γεννημένος συνθέτης που 
είναι γνωστός για να γράφει τα τραγούδια πριν από 1800, 
ακούει και βλέπει τη μουσική για σχεδόν 20 τραγούδια, 
συμπεριλαμβανομένου Shenandoah και του Danny Deever.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">conmemora la historia de la composición de la 
canción en América. ¡Aprenda cerca de 10 compositores, 
incluyendo Charles Ives (en los campos de Flander), Stephen foster 
(Oh! Susanna), y Francis Hopkinson -- el único compositor 
Americano-llevado conocido para tener canciones escritas antes de 
1800. Oiga y vea la música para casi 20 canciones, incluyendo 
Shenandoah y Danny Deever.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205756</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102866</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/song-of-america</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
